body_html:
We now have release build using Bazel for the pip package with CPU support. The GPU build is currently blocked by protobuf, we're waiting for the next protobuf release.
Will update this issue once we make more progress.

body:
We now have release build using Bazel for the pip package with CPU support. The GPU build is currently blocked by protobuf, we're waiting for the next protobuf release.
Will update this issue once we make more progress.
